appName: UNESCO World Heritage sites in Germany
displayName: UNESCO World Heritage sites in Germany
display_name: UNESCO World Heritage sites in Germany
display_long_description:
Experience the diversity of Germany as a travel destination using the example of UNESCO World Heritage Sites in a completely new, immersive way - now together with others!

Immerse yourself in the world of UNESCO World Heritage and discover Germany's cultural and natural treasures in impressive 360-degree panoramas. This application allows you to explore important world heritage sites not only on your own, but also in multiplayer mode with friends or family.

Solve interactive tasks and collect badges to document your progress. Each visit becomes a unique experience where you can learn interesting facts about each site and record your discoveries. The playful approach makes the experience educational and entertaining.

✔ Multiplayer experience: Discover the World Heritage sites together and share your experiences in real time.
✔ Interactive tasks & badges: Solve tasks and document your progress with badges.
✔ Accessibility: A design that is as barrier-free as possible enables an accessible and inclusive experience.
✔ Learning fun guaranteed: The playful approach makes history come alive and tangible.

Be inspired by the diversity and history of the World Heritage Sites and experience Germany's cultural highlights in a new dimension - alone or together with others!

Start your virtual journey of discovery through Germany's World Heritage sites now!
